title: Latest Specimen Book
content:
It has been a long time since the last specimen book I created. I enjoy the work, but is it justified? That is always the question.

[FHA Condensed French Specimen Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030043746/http:/thefontry.com/fha_condensed_french/FHA_Condensed_French_Spec_Book.pdf)
author: phrostbyte64
